amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, and Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: A qualifying child may receive the tuition waiver under section 85-2616 for up to five years if the qualifying child continues to be eligible for participation. The five years of tuition waiver eligibility starts once the qualifying child applies for and receives the tuition waiver for the first time and is available to such qualifying child for the next consecutive five years.
